reviewText: This book is valuable for 2 main reasons :- First, it is so rich in detail that it is an encyclopedia for Data Miner and CRM people. everything is described : tools, approaches, projects ...- Seconnd, an to me the  key point : it is the only book that truly integrate CRM, data warehouse  and data mining and still provide and intelligent reading !If you have a  project wuth such flavour, or before embarking a CRM project, read this  before the first meeting
title: Building Data Mining Applications for CRM
